action.name: Set text
action.param: "INFO" & newline & "A: " & str(round(Touch.Alpha)) & " B: " & str(round(Touch.Beta)) & " G: " & str(round(Touch.Gamma)) & newline & newline & "Touches: " & str(Touch.TouchCount)

action.name: Append text
action.param: newline & "Index:" & str(index) & " | X: " & str(round(Touch.XAt(index))) & " | Y: " & str(round(Touch.YAt(index)))

action.name: Append text
action.param: newline & newline & "JoyStick" & newline & "ID: " & str(testCursor.touchID) & newline & "ORI X: " & str(testCursor.originX) & " |ORI Y: " & str(testCursor.originY) & " |X: " & str(round(testCursor.X)) & " |Y: " & str(round(testCursor.Y)) & newline & "SIDE: " & str(testCursor.side) & " |SPEED: " & str(testCursor.speed)

action.name: Append text
action.param: newline & newline & "Action" & newline & "ID: " & str(testTarget.touchID) & newline & "ORI X: " & str(testTarget.originX) & " |ORI Y: " & str(testTarget.originY) & " |X: " & str(round(testTarget.X)) & " |Y: " & str(round(testTarget.Y)) & newline & "SIDE: " & str(testTarget.side) & " |POWER: " & str(testTarget.power) & newline & "History:" & newline & str(testTarget.history)
